inclusion.criterion: Age between 18 to 65 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Physician diagnosis of mild asthma based on the NIH guidelines
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Physician diagnosis of allergic rhinitis and confirmed by at least 3+ skin test response to at least one allergen
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of abnormal, reversible airway function on impulse oscillometry
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with inhaled or oral corticosteroids within one month of screening visit
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known history of reflux, lung disease, or congenital heart disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Parkinson's disease and experiences slowness of movement and tremors. He is on Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl.
